Synopsis: Converts a hashtable into an ordered dictionary.
Description: This function takes a hashtable as input and converts it into an ordered dictionary. The ordered dictionary maintains the order of elements as they were added to the hashtable.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$HashTable = @{
    "Key3" = "Value3"
    "Key1" = "Value1"
    "Key2" = "Value2"
}
ConvertTo-OrderedDictionary -HashTable $HashTable
# Outputs an ordered dictionary where the keys are in the order they were added to the hashtable.
